mapper.select: select * from ( select num, title, content, writer_id, target_id, regdate, viewcnt, img, pin, rownum r from( select * from tbl_notice order by pin desc , regdate desc)) where r > = #{startRow} and r <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notice(num, title, content, writer_id, target_id, pin, img) values( seq_notice.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer_id}, #{target_id}, #{pin}, #{img} )
mapper.update: update tbl_notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, target_id = #{target_id}, pin = #{pin}, img = #{img} where num = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notice_c(c_num, num, ref, writer_id, content) values(seq_notice_c.nextval, #{num}, seq_notice_c.nextval, #{writer_id}, #{content})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_notice_c where num = #{num}
